name: places/ChIJH7CsnS1ZwokRnnEjQvdGugE
formattedAddress: 1050 Park Ave Ste 1A, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1050 Park Ave Ste 1A, New York, NY 10028-1031, USA

originalText.text:
Not only is MMSkincare the only FDA cleared LED system, the MMSphere2Go is an AMAZING product! Not to mention (speaking from 1st hand experience), the company behind the product really goes above and beyond regarding customer service. Their dedication and follow through to any questions and concerns is impeccable; further proving their value and compassion to helping people towards a better quality of life.

I was diagnosed with leukemia in 2022, while my chemotherapy regimen has me close to remission, some common side effects  I developed is cystic acne and fatigue. From a physical standpoint, the MMSphere2Go, helped to control my acne as well as produced an overall healthier skin complexion that was apparent enough for others to notice and comment on. From an emotional standpoint, this product helped me when I needed to sleep and energized me when I needed to wake up.

In conclusion, red light therapy alone has proven time and time again that there are many benefits to utilizing. With MMSphere2Go, you get 9 different light combinations to accommodate for bright and dim settings, acne prone skin, as well as aging skin to name a few.

Thank you Dr. Marmur and team for your time to value me as a customer and help provide some positive light to each day.

originalText.text: I was a big fan of Dr Marmur for a while then I tried her regime after filling out the quiz and was not disappointed. Using the blue light and Repose serum my skin feels tighter, preserved and clearer. Also it's improving my mood. Thank you MMSkincare.

text.text: I was a big fan of Dr Marmur for a while then I tried her regime after filling out the quiz and was not disappointed. Using the blue light and Repose serum my skin feels tighter, preserved and clearer. Also it's improving my mood. Thank you MMSkincare.

originalText.text: I have been using the Revive (day) and Repose (night) Serums for 2+years.  Never has my skincare routine been so simple or the results more noticeable!  People are constantly asking me what I use and this is the most satisfied I have been with my skin.  Cannot recommend MMSkincare enough!

text.text: I have been using the Revive (day) and Repose (night) Serums for 2+years.  Never has my skincare routine been so simple or the results more noticeable!  People are constantly asking me what I use and this is the most satisfied I have been with my skin.  Cannot recommend MMSkincare enough!

originalText.text: I have been a fan of MMskincare since the launch of the brand. The line was created by one of the most trusted dermatologists in New York, Ellen Marmur. So I trusted the benefits of the skin care line even before I started to use it. I apply the Revive serum daily (I recommend to reapply a couple of time over makeup throughout the day to feel refresh and rehydrated) and and use the face mask once a week as my Sunday night salvation for calm and rejuvenated skin. Several month ago, I purchased the MMskincare Repose starter pack for a few of my clients. They all have revamped their beauty routine to include the serum and the masks. Next on my list: trying the MM Sphere which is Dr. Marmur’s LED light therapy device.

originalText.text: I remember the first day I used this product (June 27, 2018), i honestly didn’t think much of it until I woke up the next day and saw that my skin was significantly smoother. Now, I’m not saying that this guarantees results in less than 24 hrs but I can definitely say that using this daily for the last two years has transformed my skin! I have less breakouts, less texture, and overall a much more even skin tone. Everyone’s always asking me my skincare routine and im always referring them to MMSkincare. It’s so good even my mom is hooked. If the serum alone has made such a great difference, I can only imagine what would happen if I used it combined with the sphere!
